product_name: Patagonia Capilene 1 Silkweight Stretch Tank Top - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Patagonia Capilene(R) 1 Silkweight Stretch tank keeps you comfortable during intense workouts. Quick-drying Capilene fabric offers easy care and superior moisture wicking. Fabric protects skin from UV light with a UPF 50+ rating. Offset seams reduce chafing. Reflective logos on chest and center back enhance visibility. The Patagonia Capilene 1 Silkweight Stretch tank offers a slim fit. Closeout.
short_description: The Patagonia Capilene(R) 1 Silkweight Stretch tank keeps you comfortable during intense workouts.
